newsitem.title: USA: Spyglass in licensing agreement - source.
newsitem.headline: Spyglass in licensing agreement - source.

text.p: Spyglass Inc has signed an agreement to license its Internet technology for use in PowerTV operating systems, a source close to the deal said Friday.
Under the agreement, PowerTV will use the Spyglass client software development kit, giving users a connection and tools to navigate on the Internet via their televisions.
PowerTV's operating system is currently used in interactive networks from BellSouth Corp and Pacific Telesis Group, the source said.
PowerTV, based in Cupertino, Calif., provides technology and hardware for interactive entertainment and digital set-top terminals.
Spyglass, with headquarters in Naperville, Ill., provides Internet-related software.
